data: “My great-grandfather was a philosopher, and why should not his descendants be allowed the privilege of cogitating for themselves? I tell you that Sir Isaac Newton was mistaken. There is no such thing as the attraction of gravitation.”
The Funny Philosophers, or Wags and Sweethearts.  A Novel
